name: uwebsockets.js
description: micro websockets npm package fork of: https://github.com/uNetworking/uWebSockets.js
author: https://github.com/alexhultman

scripts.test: node -v && node -e "const uws = require('./dist/uws.js'); console.log(uws); uws.App() && process.exit(0);" && echo ok
scripts.postinstall: yarn clone:step1 && yarn clone:step2 && yarn make
